# isFinished

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether loading of the resource has finished.

## Declaration

```swift
var isFinished: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] initially. The value changes to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] when the delegate object handling the request calls the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetResourceLoadingRequest/finishLoading(with:data:redirect:)] or [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetResourceLoadingRequest/finishLoading(with:)] method.

## Reporting the result of the request

- **response**: The URL response for the loading request.
- **finishLoading()**: Causes the receiver to treat the processing of the request as complete.
- **isCancelled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the request has been cancelled.
- **finishLoading(with:)**: Causes the receiver to handle the failure to load a resource for which a resource loader’s delegate took responsibility.
- **finishLoading(with:data:redirect:)**: Causes the receiver to finish loading a resource for which a resource loader’s delegate took responsibility .
